notConnected.hipaaWarningIntro: Google Calendar is not HIPAA-compliant. By enabling this integration, you understand:
notConnected.hipaaPoint1: Appointment times and locations will be synced to your Google Calendar
notConnected.hipaaPoint2: Client names and other PHI will NOT be included by default
notConnected.hipaaPoint3: Google Calendar data is stored on Google's servers, not PazPaz's HIPAA-compliant infrastructure
notConnected.hipaaPoint4: You are responsible for ensuring your use complies with applicable privacy laws
notConnected.hipaaRecommendation: We recommend using generic labels like "Client Session" instead of client names.
